nodes.text: The E-series 1-9 blaster, also named Swiftkick, was a product of arms manufacturer BlasTech Industries, with only elite members of Santhe Security using it. In existence by 52 BBY, two members of Santhe Security disguised as waiters in restaurant known as the Shimmersilk on the galactic capital world of Coruscant carried this powerful and discreet blaster.
